message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending under $100. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $90?
I understand you're looking to keep your spending under $100, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $115?

I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. This brings us closer to my budget while still allowing me to purchase something valuable. Thank you for considering my request.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product.
